title: AI Image Caption Generator
description: Built using Hugging Face’s BLIP model with 90%+ accuracy. Streamlit interface for image upload and caption display. Latency reduced by 50% with caching and model loading.

title: Resume Parser using NLP
description: Python parser using spaCy, PyMuPDF, and docx2txt with high-precision regex and NLP-based entity recognition. Supports batch parsing for faster screening.

title: Time Table Management using A.I
description: AI-based scheduling system with AngularJS, MySQL. Uses ML to optimize resource allocation and reduce conflicts. Saved 5+ hours weekly in manual planning.
